transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir, Vidhika here from IndiaMART.
Customer: Ah, sollunga ma'am.
Executive: Video meet kaaga request koduthurukingannu ninaikiren.
Customer: Ma'am puriyala ma'am.
Executive: Video meet connect pannunnu sollittu request request koduthurukinga IndiaMARTla.
Customer: Oh okay ma'am.
Executive: Ma'am ippo meeting ta illa eppidi ma'am?
Customer: Aama aama meeting ku thaan request koduthurundhinga actually. Athu oru concern maari enakku raise aayirukku.
Customer: Okay ma'am meeting enakku edhume inform varallaiya athunala thaan edhume onnum sollallaiyae.
Executive: Illa neenga thaan koduthurukinga.
Customer: Seri ma'am theriyama click aayirucha ennanu theriyala. Avanga innoruthanga IndiaMART use pannittu thaan avanga edhachum theriyama click pannittaangalaannu therila.
Executive: Appdingala okay. Yenna idhu enna namma customer care irukkiya. So athukku vandhu concern maari poirukku. Neenga vandhu client has shown interest in video meet appdinnu sollittu.
Customer: Oh okay ma'am.
Executive: Oh okay ma'am innoruthanga solli koduthuttu irundhen avangale paathuttu irundhaanga athu edhachum click pannittaangalaannu therila.
Executive: Okay okay yenna namba vandhu innoruthanga four days munnadi thaan discuss pannirundhom sir IndiaMART eppidi poittu irukannu sollittu.
Customer: Aama ma'am.
Executive: Number me irukku. So athunala thaan naan ippadi yosichen eppidi indha neenga request koduthurukinga appdinnu sollittu.
Customer: Avanga innoruthangale sollittu irundhen avanga idhu pannittu irundhaanga avanga theriyama click panni vittaangannu ninaikkiren.
Executive: Okay okay edhum eppidi sir poittu irukku ippo last ah or three four enquiries eduthurukinga.
Customer: Ma'am three four enquiries ellame vandhu enna solraanganna ella product vandhu konjam satisfaction illaannu solli idhu pannittu irukkaanga idhu vara four to five days ah enna edhume kuri edhume tablet edhume varala.
Customer: Romba dalla thaan poittu irukku.
Executive: Seri sir varalainna namba relevant ah leads varalannu irukingala?
Customer: Aama ma'am.
Customer: Appidi varradhum enna panraanganna adhe combo irukka maatteengidhu enakku vera venuminnu indha maari kekraanga.
Executive: Okay okay so ippo last three four eduthadhume appidi thaan irukkungala?
Customer: Aama ma'am three four ellame appidi thaan ma'am irukku.
Executive: Idhu sir andha protein powder paathurundhingale.
Customer: Aama ma'am.
Executive: Avanga enna sonnaanga Chennai la irundhu.
Customer: Protein powder enakku kaatti avanga vachirundha flavour adhe thaan adhe branded thaan venum enakku indha branded venaanguraanga.
Executive: Okay innoru vishayam ennaanna sir idhu indha maari oru box indha 300 to 400 sorry 800 athukappuram 700 rupees indha maari leads la edhachum consume pannunga.
Customer: Andha maari idhu pannala ma'am naanga mostly indha 1000s mela indha maari yenna courier charge or 50 rupees varum athunala or 1000 rupees mela irukkum avanga thaan idhu pannunom.
Executive: Illa inga show aagum sir namba consume panna leads ah inga vandhu show aagum. So andha paakkumbodhu neraiya paathinganna indha maari leads thaan irukku. 1000 ku mela eduthadhu oru lead thaan actually vandhu inga show aagum.
Customer: Adhu vandhu first starting la vandhu oru five to six leads ah andha maari irundhirukkum ippo recent ah or four to five leads 1000s mela thaan irundhirukkum.
Executive: Okay okay recent leads me appidi thaan actually irukku yenna neenga once neenga indha maari chinna chinna small quantity edukka start pannittinga appdinnana aduthaduthu varum illaiya adhume andha maari vara aarambichirum. Oh okay ma'am. So example ku indha small quantity ah irundhaalum namba namba panra tablet oda idhu vandhurukku appdinnana neenga star symbol irukkum paarunga adhu koduthukonga.
Customer: Oh okay ma'am.
Executive: So andha maari neenga koduthukittinganna appo theriya aarambikkum. So inga okay namba indha maari products thaan panromndradhu automatic ah system judge panni ungalukku adhukana leads vara aarambikkum.
Customer: Oh okay ma'am.
Executive: Small quantity irundhuchinna indha oru tip vandhu neenga follow pannunga.
Customer: Oh okay ma'am naan use pannikkiren podhu.
Executive: Okay okay so vera edhum queries irukka sir edhum?
Customer: Vera edhum illa. Mithappadi edhum leads thaan edhum romba idha irukku andha contact laam vera edhum illa.
Executive: Vera edhum problem illa okay neenga use panna start pannunga sir adhu leads laam vara aarambichirukkum. Innaikku use pannunga means neenga nalladhaa use pannunga usage eh onnum sollala. Chinna indha maari small quantity edukkaama eppidi solradhu oru buyer oda full details irukka maari for example avangavala details right side la oru five years plus client indha maari oru sila vishayangal paathu neenga consume pannunga.
Customer: Oh okay ma'am.
Executive: Okay sir okay ippo indha conversation naan close pannikkalaama sir indha video.
Customer: Oh okay ma'am close pannirunga ma'am.
Executive: Okay ippo ennodaa response eppidi irukannu sollittu ungalukku oru mail varum sir. Andha call cut panna udane unga feedback kaana mail varum.
Customer: Okay ma'am.
Executive: Konjam neenga adha satisfy koduthinganna ennodaa growth ku adhu usefulla irukkum.
Customer: Oh okay ma'am.
Executive: Okay vera edhum issue irundhuchinna neenga ennodaa number ungalukku already irukku illaiya?
Customer: Irukku thaan ma'am.
Executive: Irukku thaan ma'am.
Customer: Seri ma'am.
Executive: Okay ma'am okay ma'am thank you sir thank you ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a video meet request.

- Dissatisfaction with lead quality.

- Leads not matching the required combo.



Resolution:

- Explained the reason for video meet request.

- Suggested using the star symbol for relevant products.

- Advised to check buyer details before consuming leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meet, product satisfaction, leads quality
